ygData.subject: Re: The Ancient crok in Upper Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: It doesn t spawn once or twice per 24 hours... it s random.  Some people have to camp for weeks to get legs, but i ve heard of people getting 3 ancient crocks
ygData.messageBody:
It doesn't spawn once or twice per 24 hours... it's random. Some people
have to camp for weeks to get legs, but i've heard of people getting 3
ancient crocks in an hour and getting legs on two of those spawns. Granted,
that was very lucky for them and not the norm... but luck is what it's all
about.

-Eachann Bronzeleaf
-Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Rose <rliu@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 25, 2000 1:36 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] The Ancient crok in Upper Guk


> From: "Rose" <rliu@...>
>
> Sorta hard to describe where he is...basically, he is near the zone to the
> live side of LG. Best way to show you where he is is have someone lead
you
> there or look at a map of UG.
>
> Dunno how exciting it would be for your guild to hunt there though. Maybe
> if they kill all the frogs while getting there. His placeholder and his
> spawn time is 15 min. I truely believe he only spawns twice in 24 hours
> though...if even that...sometimes I think he only spawns once in 24 hrs.
I
> camped that spot for 48 hrs straight practically and finally just traded
> some stuff for the leggings. I heard some people who were after the
leggins
> have to camp over a week to get em. BTW the legs are the rare drops. I
> collected up to 3 arms while camping him in 48 hours.
>
> The reason why I say that this spot might be boring for a guild raid is
due
> to the fact that it is usually camped...by ppl who usually can camp
> solo...(i.e. druids, wizzie, necro, shamans, etc) The arms are sought
after
> by the int casters and the leggins are sought after by all the wis
casters.
> On top of that...it's a pretty boring camp.
> To camp it solo...you must be at least 36. A small group (let say less
then
> 5 ppl) of 25+ can handle that spot easily.
>
> Might be best to have your guild do the entire UG to liven things a bit.
> Making a round of all the name spawn area might be fun.
>
>
>
